document_data.name: ''Blackstone Rune''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''blackstone rune''''' was a magical token used by [[shadar-kai (fey)|shadow fey]] to transit between the [[Material Plane]] and the [[Plane of Shadow]].
document_data.Description: It was a small glossy stone bearing a complex sigil.
document_data.Crafting: A ''blackstone rune'' was carved by a spellcaster who knew the ''[[plane shift]]'' spell and the art of crafting wondrous items.
document_data.Powers: The token allowed its bearer to travel from the Material Plane to the Plane of Shadow, or the reverse, as with a ''plane shift'' spell. They could take only 50 pounds (22.7 kilograms) of possessions with them. It functioned only three times.
document_data.Users: Shadar-kai weakened by their shadow curse used ''blackstone runes'' to take respite in the Plane of Shadow.
